name: Tesco Lamb 2 Hand Cut Loin Chops Welsh
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Oven><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven><Microwave><Item23 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave><Barbeque /><Grill><Instructions>Remove all packaging.Place under a pre-heated high grill for 10 - 12 minutes (medium) or 14 - 18 minutes (well done).
